description.en-us: Hot Wheels Boulevard is an adult collector-focused premium series consisting of a wide range of vehicles with Real Riders wheels, diecast bodies and chassis; it acted as a successor to Hot Wheels Garage . Originally introduced in 2012 with vehicles themed to a certain theme, the series was rebooted in 2020 with more realistically-styled vehicles, described by Mattel as having "Premium execution and awesome decos that command attention in any collection". The rebooted series is a Walmart exclusive in the United States.
